sentences.en: A government uses a cryptogram or secret code.
Cipher Card can offer cryptogram service to PC system and network security device to realize safe storage for files and secure communication for information on network.
sentences.cn: 加密卡可以为个人计算机系统、网络安全设备提供密码服务，以实现数据的安全存储和网络信息的保密通信。

sentences.en: He regarded the universe as a cryptogram set by the Almighty—just as he himself wrapt the discovery of the calculus in cryptogram when he communicated with Leibnitz.
sentences.cn: 他将宇宙视为上帝用密文书写的文件——恰如他与莱布尼兹通信时，把自己关于微积分的发现用一种加密的方式书写一样。

sentences.en: In this thesis, the basic concepts of cryptogram including number theory and modular arithmetic are introduced.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了密码学的基本概念,包括数论的基础知识和模运算的概念.

sentences.en: Lastly, the mixed cryptogram arithmetic was implemented and applied into the application of email encryption.
sentences.cn: 最后, 实现了混合加密算法,并将其应用于加密发送电子邮件中.

words.tran_cn: 关于暗号的，用密码写的
译解密码者；担任密码者
